Posts.Content: canadianchick wrote: Hi there; This might be in a tread that I haven`t found yet but I was wondering if anyone has a website link on how to tie head scarves so they don`t look ridiculous.   I missed the look good feel better  this month due to treatment dates and have to wait another 3 weeks for the next one.  (I am hoping they teach you that there) The weather is getting hot and humid and I sweat bad with the wig on.     Any suggestions would be great, I picked up a couple scaves but can`t make them look good.... Dx 1/28/2008, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tying Head Scarfs canadianchick Joia
